original_text: Solomon counted all the foreign men who were living in Israel, as his father David had done. There were 153,600 foreign men.
korean_text: 전에 솔로몬의 아버지 다윗이 이스라엘 땅에 사는 이방 사람들을 조사하였더니 이제 솔로몬이 다시 조사하매 모두 십오만 삼천 육백 명이라

sentences.original_text: Solomon counted all the foreign men
as his father David had done
